city_name: Dolores Hidalgo Cuna de la Independencia Nacional
welcome_message_title: Welcome to Dolores Hidalgo Cuna de la Independencia Nacional
welcome_message_body: Welcome to Dolores Hidalgo Cuna de la Independencia Nacional! Get ready to be enchanted by the city's colonial charm, vibrant atmosphere, and its historical significance as the birthplace of Mexico's independence. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this beautiful city has to offer.
